50.heading: Bastian, M. S.
50.title: Nouvelles émergences de la bande dessinée suisse = Die neue Ära des Schweizer Comics = New contributions to the comic-strip in Switzerland
50.author: Alex Baladi, M
50.appears_in: S. Bastian, Pierre-Alain Bertola, Claudius Gentinetta, Lea Huber, Thomas Ott, Karoline Schreiber, Anna Sommer ; concept, Patrizia Crivelli, Roland Margueron ; editing, Patrizia Crivelli ; texts, Roland Margueron, Cuno Affolter, Urs Hangartner ; translations, Peter Sidler (G), Rosamund Bandi (E), Michel Thévenaz.
notes: 1 v. : ill. (some col.) ; 31 cm.
In English, French and German.
Cover title: XX Comix.
Spine title: Comix.

"Published on the occasion of the exhibition "New contributions to the comic-strip in Switzerland" presented at the "Antichambre" Geneva, from Octobre 3 to Octobre 23, 1996 and from February 14 to April 20, 1997 at the Centre Culturel Suisse, Paris".
Includes bibliographical references.
Subjects: Swiss comics, alternative comics, exibitions of comics.
